content:
The lesions of enemy armored vehicles were made by fighters of the 25th separate assault battalion of the 47th brigade.

About thisreported March 29Land troops of the Armed Forces.

The Russian T-80BVM tank stopped in the eastern part of the village of Berdychi, its crew began inspection of the equipment, but here the Ukrainian FPV-Dron flew. The continuation was enchanting.

Asreported the armyinform, in the east, our soldiers destroyed 640 invaders, 8 tanks and almost 400 UAVs of the invaders.
title: Defense forces destroyed the Russian tank in the Avdeevsky direction
description: This was reported on March 29 by the Armed Forces. Russian T-80BVM tank stopped ...
author: Army Inform
